content.raw: Oh, I mean adding the functionality to DART for more broad applications, not necessarily related to this situation. Although I bring it up here because if some of the implementation details of how these structures were being initialized were a little bit different, it could've been much harder to configure the `WeldJointConstraint` correctly. I feel like we just happened to luck out on that matter.
content.html: Oh, I mean adding the functionality to DART for more broad applications, not necessarily related to this situation. Although I bring it up here because if some of the implementation details of how these structures were being initialized were a little bit different, it could've been much harder to configure the WeldJointConstraint correctly. I feel like we just happened to luck out on that matter.
